text:
I appreciate the whole transparent #triage process.  No matter how genius the creators of Julia are, more heads / points of view can always be useful.
It’s really amazing the progress that Julia keeps making!

text: I am sort of new to the community and have never participated on the triage process. Where/how can I find more about it?

elements.text: I am sort of new to the community and have never participated on the triage process. Where/how can I find more about it?

text: there is a <#C67TUQBG9|triage> channel which has a description with a link to a google meet that happens about every other week, thursdays 2:15pm EST.
